sentence.Network_en: The Inspector remembered her as a small, mousy woman, invariably worried.
sentence.Network_cn: 检察官记得，她是一个矮小、羞怯、总是闷闷不乐的人。

sentence.Network_en: Obsessives, in any area, are invariably as boring as their hobbies.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论在哪个领域，过分痴迷者都会跟他们的癖好一样令人厌烦。

sentence.Network_en: He was invariably willing to discuss the possibilities hypothetically.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是愿意谈论各种假设的可能性。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... invaluable a. 无价的，非常宝贵的，极为贵重的 invariably ad. 不变地，总是 invert n. 颠倒，翻转.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... painstaking a. 苦干的；费力的 invariably ad. 不变地 inspire vt. 鼓舞；使产生灵感.
考博英语词汇 ... invalid adj． 无效力的 invariably ad. 不变地，永恒地 inversely ad. 相反地.
人们无不(Invariably)仰天长哮：诙谐天禀啊先天，此乃(This is)华夏之幸，男人若爱着一个女子，与其做个先征求而后吻的懦夫，不如 …

list.abs: 1.引言经典的绝热不变量(adiabatic invariant)是指在系统的某参数缓慢变化时,相对该参数的变化而改变更慢的某一物理量[1].绝热不变量又称缓渐不变量或浸渐不.
inulin 菊粉invariant point 不变点invariant system 不变系
integral inequality 积分不等式integral invariant 积分不变式integral kernel 积分核
invariant of strain 应变不变量invariant subgroup 不变子群inverse circuit 反演电路

entry.tran: 不变地;总是;始终如一地
entry.def: If something invariably happens or is invariably true, it always happens or is always true.

example.ex: They almost invariably get it wrong...

example.tran: 他们的团队协作总是很好。

auth_sentence.content: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.
auth_sentence.res_content: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Disparity in years...is not invariably a bar to harmony.

auth_sentence.content: Why is the data invariably worse than previously thought?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why is the data invariably worse than previously thought?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why is the data invariably worse than previously thought?

auth_sentence.content: Their premium lies invariably in their raw sensory content.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their premium lies invariably in their raw sensory content.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their premium lies invariably in their raw sensory content.

Sentence.sentence: The picture worsens with each round of El Nino, the unusually warm currents in the Pacific Ocean that drive up temperatures and invariably presage (预示) droughts and fires in the rain forest.

Even if the question is ostensibly (表面上) about something outside the self (describe a fictional character or solve a problem of geopolitics), the essay invariably returns to the favorite topic: what is its impact on YOU?

sentences.cn: 我们一直始终不变地支持他。

sentences.en: It invariably rains when he goes there.
sentences.cn: 他去那里时天总是下雨。

jushi.english: It invariably rains when he goes there.
jushi.chinese: 他去那里时天总是下雨。
我们一直始终不变地支持他。
